item.description:
The Old Yarmouth Inn, established in 1696, lays claim as the oldest inn on Cape Cod.

Sunday Brunch Eggs Benedict & Belgian Waffles made to order and brought to you from the kitchen. Buffet features a Carving Station with Roast sirloin and Baked Ham an Omelet Station, bacon, sausage, home fried potatoes, mixed vegetables, fruit salas, Fresh baked bread, Croissant, pastries, Chef's homemade Soup, Seafood newburg, seasoned rice and buttered pasta.

To keep the brunch interesting, the restaurant changes Specialty Pasta, Chicken and Beef Dishes weekly so you can come back week after week and try something new. Pasta may include Potato and Cheddar Piergi with caramelized onions, Spinach Ravioli in Marinara, Roasted Vegetable agnolotti in Alfredo Cream sauce, 3-Cheese Lasagna, Zucchini tortellini in Tomato Basil Cream Sauce.

Enjoy their Chicken Entree such as Chicken Marsala, Chicken Dijon, Chicken Paprikash, Chicken & Broccoli, Chicken Cacciatore, Chicken Picatta and changing beef dishes such as Teriyaki Steak Tips, Beef Burgundy, Lamb Stew, Sliced Pork and gravy or Orange Beef.

 Desserts change too and may include Hot Apple Crisp, Lemon Meringue Pie, Boston Cream Pie. New York Style Cheesecake, Devils Food Chocolate Cake.

Sunday Brunch $18.95
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have my infamous pink hat on!

item.name: Brunch at the Old Yarmouth Inn
